name: Nanotwitter
tagline: A scaled implementation of basic Twitter functionality in Ruby.
body:
### Welcome to Nanotwitter.
This is a project for the Cosi 105 class at Brandeis University, implementing a version of Twitter and adding scalability features like caching and threading.

### Meet the Team
Hannah Provenza
B.A. 2012, University of Chicago, Linguistics
M.A. expected 2017, Brandeis University, Computational Linguistics
[linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/hprovenza)

Xinhao Wang
B.A. 2012, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, English (Finance and Business)
M.A. expected 2017, Brandeis University, Computational Linguistics
[linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/xinhaowang)

Yuzhe Chen
B.A. 2013, Beijing International Studies University, Japanese Language and Literature
M.A. expected 2017, Brandeis University, Computational Linguistics
[linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/yuzhe-chen)
